content: **bikini top ** materials drops paris from garnstudio 100-100 g colour no 55 army drops crochet hook size 5 / us j or the size needle to obtain the correct gauge **bikini bottoms ** materials safran 150-150-150 g colour no 22 brown drops crochet hook size 3 or the size needle to obtain the correct gauge string approx 1 m / 1 yd for the sides
